optionContent.option: Visit the club with Chris and his team, but insist on paying so that Chris’s hospitality is not too excessive.
Go for one drink to be polite and avoid embarrassing Chris, but make sure that he leaves after a short amount of time.

incorrect.text: Carlos visits the club with Chris and his team.

partial.text: Carlos visits the club with Chris and his team, but leaves soon after arriving.

correct.text: One of Chris’s team members gets in a fight while in the club. The police are called and later some of the group must appear in court as witnesses.

But because Carlos left after dinner and did not join them at the club, he was not involved and is not called to court. His decision to leave the club prevents embarrassment for himself and Johnson Controls by association.
